title: Personal Color Test
siteTagline: Find your best colors with a quick test
siteDescription: Discover your personal color palette. Take a simple test to find colors that suit you best.
homeMetaDesc: Discover your best season (Spring/Summer/Autumn/Winter) and get a matching palette & tips.
testMetaDesc: Answer step by step and reveal your best colors.
resultMetaDesc: See your top season type and recommended palette.
consentMessage: We use analytics tools to improve our site. Do you consent?
heroDescription: Discover the colors that suit you best through a simple test and create a more attractive style
featureSimpleDesc: Understand your color preferences with 8 simple questions
featurePersonalDesc: Get color recommendations that match your skin tone and style
featurePracticalDesc: Get tips you can apply directly to fashion and makeup
copyColorCode: Click a color to copy its code
stylingTip1: Use your main color as a focal point
stylingTip2: Choose neutral tones for basic items
stylingTip4: Select tones that match the season
usage2: Use as a color guide when shopping
disclaimer: These results are a general guideline. Personal preferences and circumstances may vary, and we recommend consulting a professional if needed.
